short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step into the world of Arcane with Jinx Hood Live Wallpaper!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Featuring the enigmatic Jinx in her hooded look, this extension adds a thrilling touch of chaos and flair to your new tab. Easily access favorite websites with shortcuts, add custom links, and stay on schedule with the integrated calendar and clock. Search the web seamlessly using your default engine.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Showcase Jinx in her iconic hooded style from the Arcane universe.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Navigate quickly to frequently visited sites.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Customize your tab with personalized links.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Stay organized with a built-in calendar and clock.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Search effortlessly with your preferred search engine.
Explore more extensions, view our Privacy Policy, or uninstall easily via the provided links.
